headline: OTT Pay Enhances its All-in-One Smart Terminal, Adds UnionPay, Discover, and Diners Club to its Payment Acceptance
summary: OTT Pay, a leading end-to-end payment gateway, announces the launch of the OTT Pay Plus App 12 in 1. The release includes significant updates to OTT Pay's current platform, including enhancements to shift reporting and, most notably, the addition of UnionPay Card, Discover, and Diners Club payment acceptance.

headline: Mastercard Incorporated (MA) Delivers Strong Q3 Results with Solid Growth Across Key Metrics
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is one of the best stocks to invest in, according to billionaire D.E. Shaw. On October 30, Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) posted a strong third-quarter performance. The company reported non-GAAP earnings of $4.38 per share, beating analyst estimates by $0.07. Revenue climbed 16.7% year-over-year to $8.6 billion, exceeding expectations by $70 million. The […]

headline: I'm Betting Big On What Everyone Else Fears - The U.S. Consumer
summary: U.S. consumers feel the pinch as inflation rises. Click here to read why I am focusing on high-quality, consumer-related value stocks and REITs.

headline: Did Mastercard’s (MA) Payment Security Initiatives and Earnings Beat Just Shift Its Investment Narrative?
summary: Mastercard recently reported third quarter 2025 earnings, with sales of US$8.60 billion and net income of US$3.93 billion, both higher than the prior year. Alongside these results, Mastercard launched a new threat intelligence solution to combat payment fraud and advanced talks to acquire blockchain infrastructure provider Zero Hash, highlighting its focus on payment security and digital currency innovation. We'll explore how Mastercard's launch of a payment-focused threat intelligence...
